article2: Affiliate marketing is one of the latest forms of digital advertising in which online businesses and media collaborate to sell products. The mechanism of synergy in sales is that the media advertises the products or services and in case of sales the businesses pay a certain percentage to the media as synergy commission. Runak Affiliate, the first independent sales collaboration platform in Kurdistan, is a two-way network of brands and publishers that simplifies the sales collaboration process.
article3: You may ask, why should a platform be used to promote a digital campaign? Why give up the old ways and resort to technology? The answer is obvious; In order to show your ad to the target audience at the right time and place. At the Luminous Digital Advertising Platform you can run various forms of online advertising, including banner ads, videos and social media advertising. The targeting and filters of this platform will help you to ensure that your message reaches the people you want.
article4: With the growing number of social media users, advertising on these networks has become important for businesses. However, finding the right pages for advertising is a challenge faced by many digital marketers. Runak Social solves this problem by providing a list of the best pages and influencers. On the bright platform, you can find influencers related to your field of work with a few clicks and order ads from them. Various bright social filters make it easy to choose the best pages for you.
article5: In this type of advertising, called job marketing, Runak advertises your application in different media and spaces and charges a fee in case of employment or the event you want. The advertising space for this service includes other mobile applications, Google Play App Store, search engines, etc. Advertising placements and events in apps ensures app owners that they don’t waste any budget and only pay for the desired results.
